item.title: About me
item.description: Welcome to the blog of TheDreamIsStillAlive, a former professional poker player from Norway. My Story After a decade-long career (2007-2016) in online poker, I decided to step away from the tables to explore new horizons. My adventures led me through the realms of education and a conventional 9-5 job, but the allure of poker never faded. Even during my hiatus, I managed to claim an unexpected victory at the Norwegian Championship Main Event of Online Poker, reigniting my passion for the game.
